full_text:
Almost time for FOOTBALL! So let's do a quick Thursday night game preview, using advanced stats from the #nflverse

#DALvsTB

Plenty to talk about in this Viz, so lets get into it...

1/ https://t.co/mfFicXVjf2

An updated version of my record projections utilizing Vegas spread lines for all games

The lines get converted to Massey ratings and then into Elo ratings to run simulations using @nflseedR (by Lee Sharpe and Sebastian Carl)

This is the aggregate result of 10000 sims

#nflverse https://t.co/fD9Ac3MLys

Some differences from play-action.

Goff, Mayfield and Cousins starts under center.
Jackson, Tua, Murray, Hurts starts in shotgun
